We'll be back on January 7 -- Happy New Year!


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(DeclareDesign)
library(ggplot2)

pop <-
  declare_model(
    N = 14,
    X = c("H", "A", "P", "P", "Y", " ", 
          "H", "O", "L", "I", "D", "A", "Y", "S"),
    position = N:1,
    index = match(X, LETTERS)
  )

ggplot(data = pop(), aes(index, position, color = X)) +
  geom_text(aes(label = X)) +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.position = "none", axis.title = element_blank())
```
